descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: LeBron James tosses up an alley-oop, and DeAndre Jordan elevates to throw down a powerful one-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (DeAndre Jordan punches home alley-oop from LeBron) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: DeAndre Jordan punches home alley-oop from LeBron

videos.description: LeBron James takes the bump and somehow is able to sink the difficult shot as he falls away from the basket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron sinks difficult and-1 bucket) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron sinks difficult and-1 bucket

videos.description: Russell Westbrook drives and is stopped in his tracks by Myles Turner who shuts down the layup attempt with a huge block.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Myles Turner shuts down Westbrook) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Myles Turner shuts down Westbrook

videos.description: Chris Duarte gets the ball in the corner and somehow is able to knock down a 3-pointer as he falls out of bounds to force overtime against the Lakers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Chris Duarte drains unreal 3-pointer to force OT) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: Chris Duarte drains unreal 3-pointer to force OT

videos.description: LeBron James comes up clutch in overtime as he nails two big-time 3-pointers and a nice fadeaway for the Lakers as they go on to win 124-116 over the Pacers in overtime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron knocks down 3 clutch shots in OT) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron knocks down 3 clutch shots in OT

videos.description: LeBron James goes off in his return as he scores 39 points to lead the Lakers to an exciting overtime win over the Pacers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron puts up 39 points in OT win vs. Pacers) 2021/11/25 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron puts up 39 points in OT win vs. Pacers

videos.description: A fan proposes at the Pacers game with some help from Chris Duarte on the Jumbotron.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Highlight (Chris Duarte gets an assist on this marriage proposal) 2021/11/24

videos.headline: Chris Duarte gets an assist on this marriage proposal

videos.description: LeBron James points out two fans to referees, and the fans are quickly escorted out of the arena.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (LeBron gets two fans ejected in Indiana) 2021/11/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron gets two fans ejected in Indiana

videos.description: LeBron James assures his elbow on Isaiah Stewart was accidental and doesn't agree with the league's decision to suspend him.

tracking.trackingName: COM_NBA Presser (LeBron says his elbow on Stewart didn’t warrant suspension) 2021/11/24 ESHEET

videos.headline: LeBron says his elbow on Stewart didn't warrant suspension
